notes: Part IV available in hard copy only in the Commons and Lords libraries
description: I. Letter dated 01/12/2008 from Chloe Chitty, Assistant Director, to David Ruffley MP regarding unpublished Home Office research reports. II. Process study of the NOMS North West Offender Management Pathfinder by Julie Wilkinson and Veronica Hollis. 58 p. III. Approved premises: referrals, admissions and immediate outcomes, by Szanne Edmonds, Robin Elliott-Marshall and Samantha Foster. 86 p. IV. Lessons learnt from the Restorative Justice Diversion Project, December 2005. 27 p.
